1001.description: Instantly kick out 1 Nasty Customer and gain 3 Food.

1002.description: Speed up the Disaster by 6 turns and gain 2 Buildings.

1003.description: Construct 1 Lucky Cat. The Lucky Cat will grant 1 Building profit each turn.

1005.description: Instantly increase the level of a cell by 1.

1006.description: Instantly gain profits from all resource cells within a column and remove all corresponding cells.

1007.description: Instantly gain profits from all resource cells in a 3×3 area and remove all corresponding cells.

1008.description: Choose 1 cell. The next time you move this cell, movement range will go up by 3.

1009.description: Instantly produce 1 Food equal to the level of the current lowest-level cell.
